startScreen.title: Distractor
startScreen.description: The "Distractor" app serves for short-term mental distraction and concentration enhancement through simple memory and distraction tasks.

about.title: About the App
about.appDescription: The 'Distractor' app serves for short-term mental distraction and concentration enhancement through simple memory and distraction tasks. The goal is to support users in temporarily distancing themselves from subjectively stressful thoughts in everyday life and to direct their attention to neutral or positive cognitive content.
about.disclaimer1: 'Distractor' is a wellness and lifestyle application and not a medical device within the meaning of the EU Medical Device Regulation (MDR).
about.disclaimer2: The app is not intended for diagnosis, treatment, relief or prevention of diseases.
about.liability1: The use of the "Distractor" app is at your own risk. The provided content serves exclusively for general mental distraction and concentration enhancement.
about.liability2: The app does not constitute medical, psychological or therapeutic advice and does not replace professional treatment by qualified medical or psychotherapeutic personnel.
about.liability3: In case of persistent or severe psychological stress, it is strongly recommended to seek professional help.
about.acknowledgment: I have understood the content and taken note of it.
about.alertMessage: The app cannot be started without agreeing to the terms of use. Please read the text and check the box.

taskExamples.title: Task Explanations
taskExamples.subtitle: Here are all available tasks with examples:
taskExamples.footer: Each task is adapted according to difficulty level.

pie.title: Pie Task
pie.description: You will see a red circle with 1 - 4 blue colored segments. Remember the position of the blue colored segments. Then solve a math problem and tap on the previously blue colored segments.

chess.title: Chess Task
chess.description: You will see a chessboard with 1 - 4 blue colored squares. Remember the position of the blue colored squares. Then solve a math problem and tap on the previously blue colored squares.

math.title: Math Task
math.description: Solve simple math problems during the distraction phase.

hand.title: Hand Task
hand.description: You will see a hand with a red dot above one of the fingers. Remember the side of the hand (right or left) and the finger with the red dot (thumb = 1, little finger = 5). Solve the math problem and then indicate the side of the hand and the finger.

face.title: Face Task 1
face.description: You will see a face. Remember the face, then solve the math problem and afterwards tap on the previously shown face in the group of images.

face2.title: Face Task 2
face2.description: You will see a group of 4-6 faces. You will see this group of faces 4 - 6 times in this task. In between you solve a math problem. You should tap each image only once in total. The images change their positions, i.e. you must remember the faces you have already tapped.

faden.title: Thread Task
faden.description: You will see an image with 2 threads. Follow the thread that starts at x and tap on the digit at the end of this thread.
